entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 9:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C

Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %

Dewpoint: -0.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
